snippet.title: CYPHER Cyberpunk Text Adventure
snippet.description:
The comeback of commercial text adventures! immerse yourself into a fantastic noir dystopian future where you play as Dogeron Kenan, a low-life criminal being chased by a group of mercenaries through NeoSushi City, Japan after a data-smuggling deal goes horrible wrong.

== Checkout our website for more info! ==
http://www.cabrerabrothers.com/

A beautiful young woman wearing red cowboy boots following you in a Yakuza nightclub. A pack of Retrievers hired to chop your head off and "Mr.Smith", a mysterious man who claims to be a friend in a world where everyone is after the passcode stored in your synapse. Will you live long enough to see what unlocks?
